CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Alert_Status__c , 'Green'), IMAGE('/resource/1321940859000/greenIcon', "green traffic light" , 20, 20) , IF(ISPICKVAL( Alert_Status__c , 'Amber'), IMAGE('/resource/1321940859000/yellowIcon', "amber traffic light" , 20, 20), IF(ISPICKVAL( Alert_Status__c , 'Red'), IMAGE('/resource/1321940859000/redIcon', "red traffic light" , 20, 20), 'No Alert Indicator') ) )
CustomField.label: Dep -Alert Indicator
